Name: GamrCorps
AboutMe:
Whoever walks with the wise becomes wise, but the companion of fools will suffer harm.

Proverbs 13:20

My name is GamrCorps and I have been a member of the Stack Exchange network for almost a year now. I love to program, play games and make challenges. I play strategy games and my primary programming languages are Java and Python, although I know others such as C# and Lua. My primary golfing languages are CJam and Minecraft.

I have created the golfing language Glava, a golfing dialect of Java.

You can also find me on The Nineteenth Byte. Just ping me with @GamrCorps.

But he said to me, "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness." Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me. 10 That is why, for Christ's sake, I delight in weaknesses, in insults, in hardships, in persecutions, in difficulties. For when I am weak, then I am strong.

2 Corinthians 12:9-10
